attributes.action: Ban all sectarian marches in the United Kingdom and Northern Ireland.
attributes.background: This is a call to ban ALL public sectarian marches in the United Kingdom and Northern Ireland. These displays of bigotry and hatred no longer have a place in our society in the 21st century. Any group that wishes to carry on doing so should hire a venue for the hatefest and taken off our streets.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for. 

If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here:
http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/
